tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE geofence_events (
  event_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  device_id INT,
  event_type VARCHAR(50),
  event_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  geofence_id INT,
  geofence_name VARCHAR(100)
)

CREATE TABLE geofence_data (
 id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 device_id INT,
 geofence_name VARCHAR(255),
 coordinates VARCHAR(255),
 entry_time TIMESTAMP,
 exit_time TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE notifications (
 id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 device_id INT,
 notification_type VARCHAR(255),
 message TEXT,
 sent_time TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE geofence_locations (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    location_name VARCHAR(255),
    latitude DECIMAL,
    longitude DECIMAL
)
